column1: Holders of preferred stock will be entitled to receive when as and if declared by our oard of Directors cash dividends at the ra
and on the dates established by such series of preferred stock. Dividend rates may be fixed or variable or both. Different series of

preferred stock may be entitled to dividends at different dividend rates or based upon different methods of determination. Each
dividend will be payable to the holders of record as they appear on our stock books on record dates determined by our oard of
Directors. Dividends on preferred stock may be cumulative or noncumulative. If our oard of Directors fails to declare a dividen
